full_output.summary: A Software Engineer who loves working on web development, machine learning, and creating useful software. I enjoy solving tricky problems and coming up with smart, practical solutions. Ive built and maintained websites, used machine learning to make predictions, and worked with various technologies. Im comfortable handling all parts of software development, from designing and coding to testing and refining. Always eager to learn and improve, I focus on delivering reliable and effective solutions.

education.field_of_study: Computer Science Engineering with IOT and Intelligent System

projects.name: Stock Trading and Analysis System
projects.description: Developed a stock trading and analysis system using Python, integrating machine learning models (LSTM and GRU) for stock price prediction. Implemented features for stock transactions, data preprocessing, and prediction evaluation, including real-time decision-making for buying and selling stocks.

projects.name: Project Management System
projects.description: Developed a project management system (in a team) and library management system (alone) using PHP, JavaScript, and CSS with a relational database management system (RDBMS). Implemented features for managing projects and library resources, ensuring efficient data handling and user interface design.

projects.name: People Counting System
projects.description: Developed a people counting system using Python and OpenCV, capable of processing video from Wi-Fi cameras, webcams, and video tracked files, and displayed results with bounding boxes.

projects.name: Gesture-Based Input System
projects.description: Developed a gesture-based input system using Python, OpenCV to detect hand gestures and simulate mouse clicks. Implemented real-time hand tracking, touch detection between thumb and index finger, and integrated with pyautogui for click simulation.

projects.name: Secure Messaging System
projects.description: Developed a secure messaging system with user authentication and AES-encrypted messaging using Python, including custom password hashing, RSA key generation, and AES encryption/decryption.

projects.name: Academic Projects
projects.description: Developed academic projects using DSA, OOP and Computer Networks concepts, such as a To-Do List Manager, Student Gradebook System, and Library Catalog. Demonstrated skills in efficient data handling, object-oriented design, and practical problem-solving.

full_output.name: VIBHU JANGRA
